sentence: Mandela Barnes, state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson and Alex Lasry, on leave from his executive job with the Milwaukee Bucks.
author: Bill Glauber
title: U.S. Sen. Ron Johnson poised to announce run for a third term as early as next week, according to sources

sentence: An internal poll released by the campaign on Friday found that he has a 29-point lead over Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry and is 30 points ahead of Wisconsin Treasurer Sarah Godlewski.
author: Mychael Schnell
title: Barnes rakes in almost $150K after Johnson enters Wisconsin Senate race

sentence: Democrats have plenty of options, including Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, who has made her appeal in rural areas a key argument for her campaign.
title: Opinion: Democrats cannot afford to blow it in Wisconsin's Senate race

sentence: Among the candidates are Mandela Barnes, the current lieutenant governor; Alex Lasry, son to a part-owner of the Milwaukee Bucks; Sarah Godlewski, current state treasurer; and Tom Nelson, current Outagamie County executive.
author: Salena Zito
title: The tea leaves in Wisconsin look promising for Republicans
